T09kbavk10u:0: campopānte vimalanalinītīraparyantavasī śāstā pūrvaṃ sakalabhuvanānugrahāya pravṛttah /
T09kbavk10u:1: pṛṣṭaḥ sparśāvagatirucinā (?) bhikṣuṇānandanāmnā garbhārambhāt prabhṛti janatājanmavṛttiṃ jagāda // KAvk_10.1 //
T09kbavk10u:2: śuklaiḥ kṛṣṇaiḥ śabalarucibhir dehināṃ karmasūtraiś citraṃ loke bahutaradaśaṃ dṛśyate janmavastram
T09kbavk10u:3: jīrṇasyāpi vyasanamalinasnehalīnaḥ prayatnair yasyātyantaṃ cirapariṇater naiva niryāti rāgaḥ puṃsaḥ śukraṃ vigalitadhṛter ārtavaṃ yoṣitaś ca sparśāveśavyatikarajuṣoḥ saṃgame saṃnipātāt
T09kbavk10u:4: ekībhūtaṃ vrajati niyamāt kasya cid bījabhāvaṃ yo 'ntas tasmin bhavati sahasā saṃnikāṣe yathāgniḥ rāgodgāraḥ sphaṭikaśakalaṃ megham ambhodhipāthaḥ puṣpāmodas tilaṃ iva śanaiḥ kāñcanaṃ vāgnitāpaḥ
T09kbavk10u:5: so 'yaṃ garbhaṃ viśati niyatair apy asaṃlakṣyavṛttir vāyur gandhair iva bahuvidhaiḥ karmabhir vāsyamānaḥ // KAvk_10.4 //
T09kbavk10u:8: kaṃ cit kālaṃ vahati vikṛtiṃ nirvikārāyamāno māyūrāṇḍe jalamaya iva vyaktabhaktir mayūraḥ tatrādhānād ghanakalalatāśalyapeśyādyavasthās tyaktvā tās tā jaṭharajanitenoṣmaṇā pacyamānaḥ
T09kbavk10u:10: kleśaṃ bhuṅkte kim api viṣamaṃ duḥkhasaṃjñāprapannaḥ // KAvk_10.6 //
T09kbavk10u:11: kāle vṛntāt svayaṃ iva phalaṃ vicyutaṃ karmapākāt tatkālotthair avihatajavaiḥ preritaḥ pūtivātaiḥ
T09kbavk10u:12: lakṣyābhyāsāyatanasacivair ācitaḥ karmabandhair niryāty antaḥ śara iva dhanuryantraṇair yantramuktaḥ uttānāsyaḥ saralarasanaś cūcukāgraṃ lihānaḥ stanyaṃ mātuḥ pibati yad asau naiva karṇena nākṣṇā
T09kbavk10u:13: janmābhyāsavyasanayatanāyāsasaṃvāsalinā sā tasyāgre sakalakalanādeśini vāsanaiva // KAvk_10.8
T09kbavk10u:14: syūtair antar vividhaviṣayasvādasaṃpādabhedair vyāptaḥ sūtair (?) bisalava iva vyaktatantupratānaiḥ
T09kbavk10u:17: hastākarṣaiḥ śayanavasanāgharṣaṇaiḥ pīḍyamānaḥ sthāne sthāne taralitatanuḥ kīṭakair bhakṣyamāṇaḥ
T09kbavk10u:18: nityākrandī vacanavirahāt kāyikīṃ kleśaśailīṃ kaṃ bobrūte viṣamavipadām āspadatvaṃ prayātaḥ pīḍodvāntaiś churitavadanaḥ procchalatkṣīrapūrair uttānorastalanipatitair ukṣito lakṣyate 'sau /
T09kbavk10u:19: māyāvadhvāḥ smaraṇaharaṇaprauḍhakelīvilāse hāseneva sphuritarucinā nirbharavyāptakāyaḥ // so 'tha prāpte lipiparicaye helayā dattahaste saṃsāre 'sminn avicalitayā bandhalekhyakriyāsu
T09kbavk10u:20: janmāvartaṃ nijaṃ iva likhan dīrghaṃ oṃkāram ādau varge varge vitarati matiṃ bhogasarge niviṣṭaḥ prāptaprajñaḥ katham api galadbālabhāvapramohaḥ kāmautsukyāt punar api pare yauvane naṣṭasaṃjñaḥ
T09kbavk10u:21: niḥsāreṣu vyasanavilasadmeghasaudāminīnāṃ badhnāty āsthāṃ sthirataradhiyā yoṣitāṃ vibhrameṣu vāci śrotraṃ vapur api calāliṅganeṣv aṅganānāṃ ghrāṇaṃ vaktrāsavaparimale svādanaṃ tadrase ca /
T09kbavk10u:22: pātre kurvan dṛśam api mukhe suptasarvakriyo 'sau
T09kbavk10u:24: dveṣṭi snigdhaṃ paricitaparidveṣaśīlaḥ sa kāmī vāñchaty anyāṃ navanavarasaḥ saprayatno 'nyakāmām
T09kbavk10u:25: ity anyonyānucitacaritālakṣyavailakṣyasākṣī hāsyāyaiva prakṛtivirasaś citratantro 'sya kāmaḥ alpādhāre viṣayajaladhau majjataḥ sajjataś ca bhraṣṭasyāsya pratihatagateḥ kuñjarasyeva paṅke
T09kbavk10u:26: kiṃkartavyāvagatirahitā jāyate mohamūrcchā nītasyāndhyaṃ katipayadinasthāyinā yauvanena // yāvatkālaṃ bhramati calati prīyate jṛmbhate 'sau
T09kbavk10u:28: tāvat tasyopari paripatary eva kālapramuktā prāleyālīdhavalapalitacchadmanā vadhyamālā // kāle kāle kṣaṇakalanayā mohanidrāvaśena prāptaṃ nāsmin vapuṣi sukṛtaṃ naiva dattaṃ na bhuktaṃ
T09kbavk10u:29: itthaṃ caurair iva sa muṣitaś cintayaty eva duḥkhāt saṃmūḍhānāṃ anuśayaphalaḥ so 'vasādapramādaḥ tasmin yāte lalitavanitāpuṣpavallīvasante duṣkarmāptadraviṇatulayā yauvane svapnakalpe /
T09kbavk10u:30: naṣṭāśeṣaprakṛtir akhilaiḥ kheditāṅgair viraktair rājyabhraṃśe nṛpa iva sukhaṃ so 'tha śocaty atītaṃ // KAvk_10.19 //
T09kbavk10u:31: āyur nītaṃ na ca samucitaṃ yācakāyopanītaṃ nāpy unnītaṃ diśi diśi yaśaḥ satpathaṃ na pratītaṃ pītaṃ yācñāviṣam adhigataṃ sphītasaṃtāpaśītaṃ bhītaṃ pāpāt kim api na mayā yat tad eva praṇītaṃ kvāsau hemadrumaruciharā hāriṇī yauvanaśrīḥ kāyaḥ kvāyaṃ kṛmihatataruprāyavicchāyapākaḥ /
T09kbavk10u:32: dūrād etāḥ parihṛtadṛśāḥ koṇalīnaṃ taruṇyaḥ śuṣkaṃ śītaṃ tarum iva vane vānaraṃ māṃ vadanti so 'yaṃ kāyaḥ śrayati vilayaṃ naiva māyānikāyaḥ srastāḥ sarve daśanamaṇayas te ca keśāḥ na doṣāḥ /
T09kbavk10u:33: gātrotsāhe praharati marun naiva mohaprarohe kṣīṇasyeyaṃ śayanaśaraṇasyāpi tṛṣṇākṣayā me // saṃcintyeti prasṛtaviṣamaśvāsahikkārdito (?) 'sau
T09kbavk10u:35: mūkibhūtaḥ svajanavirahaṃ dhyāyati dhvastadhairyaḥ śakticchedād ṛṇaṃ iva mahat prāptakālo daridraḥ // KAvk_10.23 //
T09kbavk10u:36: bhūmiṃ gehaṃ vasu parijanaṃ putradārādi cānyat tāvat tāvat kalayati dhiyā prāṇaparyantakāle
T09kbavk10u:37: yāvaj janmany api punar asau snehamohānubandhais tais tair antaḥ kṛtaparicayas tanmayībhāvam eti // KAvk_10.24 //
T09kbavk10u:38: duḥkhaṃ duḥsahapāpakarmajanitaṃ kumbhīsahasrāntare bhuktvā rauravakālasūtranarakeṣv āvartate yoniṣu /
T09kbavk10u:39: yad vā puṇyakalārjitaṃ sukhapadaṃ tat saṃkṣaye duḥkhadaṃ sānāgāmiphalāptaye vimaladhīs tasmāt samādhīyatāṃ // KAvk_10.25 //
